sectionOne.p: Adjustable hard & soft clipper module from KNOCK.

sectionTwo.p: KNOCK Clipper is a premium quality, user adjustable hard / soft clipper designed by DECAP. It is the CLIP module from his acclaimed plugin, KNOCK. It is inspired by the signature sound of his popular drum kit series DRUMS THAT KNOCK, which has helped shaped the sonics of modern music.

sectionThree.p: Push your drums hard without ever going above 0db to give your drums a warm, aggressive tone reminiscent of pushing vintage analogue gear into 'the red'. Select a harder clip curve for a more aggressive tone, or a softer clip curve for a rounder tone. KNOCK Clipper has an optional high quality mode to enable oversampling.

sectionFour.p: Supported by all major DAWs in 64-bit VST3, AU and AAX format.
mac: 9 OSX 10.12+ - AU, VST3, AAX (Fully compatible with both Mac OS Ventura and Apple M1 & M2.)
Intel Core i5, i7, i9, Xeon, Apple M1
pc: Intel Core i5, i7, i9, Xeon (all Gen 5 and above), AMD Quad Core

sectionFive.h2: TAKE YOUR DRUMS TO THE NEXT LEVEL
